LanguageData.ARA_CreepFungus.label: carpet fungi
LanguageData.ARA_CreepFungus.description: Fungi harvested from creeping flowers. It can be eaten raw but tastes better after cooking.
LanguageData.ARA_CreepPlant.label: Fungus carpet
LanguageData.ARA_CreepPlant.description: A strange plant that can only grow on Arachne's carpet. Although it must grow in the dark, it consumes almost no fertility and produces mushrooms that can be eaten by the insects.
LanguageData.ARA_BeeSpikePlant.label: Bee sting flower
LanguageData.ARA_BeeSpikePlant.description: A fungal hybrid cultivated by the Arachne swarm, it absorbs the nutrients of the fungus carpet, undergoes metamorphosis after growing to a certain stage, and finally transforms into a stinger-a sentient fungus that can use poisonous needles to attack the enemy.
LanguageData.ARA_AcidlingTrapPlant.label: Exploding Nest Flower
LanguageData.ARA_AcidlingTrapPlant.description: A fungal mixture cultivated by the Arachne swarm, it absorbs nutrients from the carpet, undergoes metamorphosis after growing to a certain stage, and eventually transforms into an Arachne explosion cocoon - a special trap that releases suicidal auxiliary insects to nearby enemies.
LanguageData.ARA_Bacterium_Plant.label: Ju bacteria
LanguageData.ARA_Bacterium_Plant.description: A peculiar plant that can only grow on the Arachne carpet. Although it must grow in the dark, it consumes almost no fertility and produces the activated bacteria needed by the insect colony.
